Plot: Robbie, the singer and Julia, the waitress are both engaged to be married but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.
Title: The Wedding Singer
Actors: Adam Sandler, Drew Barrymore, Christine Taylor, Allen Covert
tomatoConsensus: It's decidedly uneven -- and surprisingly sappy for an early Adam Sandler comedy -- but The Wedding Singer is also sweet, funny, and beguiling.
